video.title: Republic of Doyle
video.synopsis: A pair of father and son private investigators tries to keep their combustible personal lives in check while tackling an intriguing array of cases.

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles help a close family friend fight a manslaughter charge, and Jake's relationship with his ex-wife, Nikki, heats up.
episodes.title: Fathers and Sons

episodes.synopsis: A young woman comes to the Doyles for help in finding her unknown biological father, and Jake tries to extract himself from Nikki.
episodes.title: The Return of the Grievous Angel

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles take on a cold arson case for Mal's old flame to find out the tragic truth of what really happened when a girl died in a bar fire.
episodes.title: Duchess of George

episodes.synopsis: A wrongfully convicted murderer gets out of prison and offers the Doyles a generous payday if they find the real killer.
episodes.title: Blood Is Thicker Than Blood

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles start trailing a potentially cheating husband to find he deeply loves his wife, but is in deep trouble with some menacing smugglers.
episodes.title: Hit and Rum

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles help Jake's high school girlfriend run off into the sunset with her new husband, who's running from both bad guys and good guys.
episodes.title: The One Who Got Away

episodes.synopsis: Jake sets out to find the identity of a beautiful amnesiac who stumbles across his path, and Martin Poole wreaks havoc in Rose and Mal's relationship.
episodes.title: The Woman Who Knew Too Little

episodes.synopsis: A grieving widow hires the Doyles to find out why her husband left a generous sum of money in his will to a woman she doesn't know.
episodes.title: The Tell-Tale Safe

episodes.synopsis: Jake gets conned into taking the case of a missing truck, and when his divorce becomes final, Jake tells Leslie that he's now a free agent.
episodes.title: He Sleeps With the Chips

episodes.synopsis: When Mal leaves town and lends Jake out to be shadowed by a pompous crime novelist, Jake's entire life is put under the authorial microscope.
episodes.title: The Pen Is Mightier Than the Doyle

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal are pulled into a family favor case when Walter's soon-to-be brother-in-law inexplicably disappears on the day of his wedding.
episodes.title: A Horse Divided

episodes.synopsis: Jake receives a mysterious late-night call from Christian, Mal is suddenly sidelined, and Jake tries to save his tormented brother from the police.
episodes.title: The Fall of the Republic

episodes.synopsis: Leslie and Jake take steps to move on from each other as Rose tries to figure out the next steps after Mal's heart attack.
episodes.title: Live and Let Doyle

episodes.synopsis: Jake plays prisoner when he goes "inside" to find out the location of some stolen diamonds from a gang of incarcerated criminals.
episodes.title: Popeye Doyle

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles are employed to help a comedian on the edge of a comeback find a dangerous stalker. Leslie defines the boundaries for the men in her life.
episodes.title: A Standup Guy

episodes.synopsis: It gets personal when the Doyles band together to protect someone they love from the cops and from a killer. Tinny gets in further with her new hobby.
episodes.title: The Son Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: It's matrimony -- Doyle style -- as Jake and Mal are tasked with finding the person responsible for sabotaging an upcoming wedding.
episodes.title: Something Old, Something New

episodes.synopsis: When an old Doyle family friend accidentally goes missing at sea, the Doyles are hired by his daughter to find out what really happened.
episodes.title: The Ryans and the Pittmans

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal are called to check into some death threats that have been made to a respected psychiatrist. An old "friend" from the past shows up.
episodes.title: Crashing on the Couch

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles take on a case from a dodgy "old friend" who promises them a big payday. Jake and Allison's work lives affect their personal relationship.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Devil

episodes.synopsis: When Des finds himself in a very bizarre and compromising position, the Doyle clan works overtime to get him off the hook.
episodes.title: Will the Real Des Courtney Please Stand Up?

episodes.synopsis: Crime novelist Garrison Steele returns to both hire and torment Jake to help him research a murder case.
episodes.title: The Special Detective

episodes.synopsis: Jake buys an expensive gift for Allison only to have it stolen. The mayor finds himself in a compromising position and asks for Jake's help.
episodes.title: Don't Gamble With City Hall

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles are hired by a real estate agent to investigate a series of strange occurrences at the site of her controversial housing development.
episodes.title: St. John's Town

episodes.synopsis: When Tinny and Des are snatched from the safety of the Doyle home in broad daylight, Jake is forced to confront a dangerous man from his past.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: Sgt. Jake Doyle is assigned to protect a mob informant, but when a mysterious group of men impede him, Jake finds the tables turned.
episodes.title: Streets of St. John's

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal investigate a hit-and-run and encounter a slippery criminal couple. Rose has a run-in with familiar ghosts from her past.
episodes.title: Head Over Heels

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles are hired to recover a missing item belonging to a beautiful client. Nikki asks Jake a favor he wants nothing to do with.
episodes.title: Hot Package

episodes.synopsis: Novelist Garrison Steele returns, hiring the Doyles to track down the love of his life. On the home front, the Doyles get a new houseguest.
episodes.title: Rusted Steele

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles investigate the murder of an old client. But when the body count rises, Jake starts to question the whole case.
episodes.title: Dead Man Talking

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Leslie find themselves trapped while trying to stop a robbery in progress. Mal and Des try to locate Jake before it's too late.
episodes.title: The Dating Game

episodes.synopsis: Jake is forced to help his high school nemesis track down missing money and win back the heart of his estranged wife.
episodes.title: High School Confidential

episodes.synopsis: Stuck in the penitentiary, Jake's only chance of freedom lies in the capture of a kidnapper. Mal and Rose investigate a case that hits close to home.
episodes.title: Two Jakes and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: With the infamous Maurice Becker back in town, Jake must get to the bottom of Maurice's fabrications before he disappears again.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror

episodes.synopsis: As a member of a biased jury, Jake struggles to exonerate an innocent woman. A decision from Kathleen's past puts the Doyles in danger.
episodes.title: One Angry Jake

episodes.synopsis: When Des's dad is kidnapped after being released from jail, the Doyles must band together and save Jody Redmond before it's too late.
episodes.title: Live Wire

episodes.synopsis: Jake is hired to retrieve a priceless violin from a familiar con artist. Mal continues to dig into the death of his former partner.
episodes.title: Con, Steal, Love

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles struggle to prove Mal's innocence when he's accused of murder but end up digging a deeper hole. Kathleen gets some brotherly help.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: The extended Doyle family shows up on the doorstep unannounced and in huge trouble, leaving Jake and Mal to tangle with some formidable gangsters.
episodes.title: From Dublin With Love

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal are given no choice but to help an escaped convict prove his innocence, and they get a glimpse of the city's drug trade in the bargain.
episodes.title: Bloodwork

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal are hired by a man to find his wife, who he claims is alive and well despite being reported dead for years.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: After a ransom drop goes bad, Jake and Mal fight against the clock and an unpredictable man to find the location of a kidnapped girl.
episodes.title: Carlotta's Way

episodes.synopsis: Jake's worst fears are realized upon discovering that Leslie has gone missing while working her dangerous undercover assignment.
episodes.title: The Heroine

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles are hot on the trail of an international art thief. Constable Hayward makes a grave mistake with career-impacting implications.
episodes.title: The Common Wealth

episodes.synopsis: Jake rushes to Leslie's side when her father's death takes them to her hometown, where the Doyles investigate after the death is ruled suspicious.
episodes.title: In Brigus

episodes.synopsis: Jake juggles multiple cases while looking into attempts made on the life of his ex-girlfriend. Tinny's relationship with Jake is becoming strained.
episodes.title: Multi-Tasking

episodes.synopsis: After Jake is kidnapped and nearly burned alive, he escapes and teams up with Mal to track down his would-be killers.
episodes.title: Retribution

episodes.synopsis: Mal and Rose try to keep an old friend safe and find out what kind of business he's really into. Jake is laid up with a bad injury.
episodes.title: Gimme Shelter

episodes.synopsis: When a crazed bomber takes over the police station, it's up to Jake to try to diffuse the situation before the hostage crisis turns fatal.
episodes.title: The Devil Inside

episodes.synopsis: The city is thrown into chaos when a prison break floods the streets with escaped cons, and a threat against Tinny makes it personal for Jake.
episodes.title: The Return of Kingpin

episodes.synopsis: With Tinny abducted at gunpoint by Maurice Becker, Jake and Crocker have no choice but to work together to get her back.
episodes.title: What Doesn't Kill You

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles and Leslie finally find out where Jake has been all this time -- but he's brought some trouble back with him.
episodes.title: Bon Cop, Bueno Cop

episodes.synopsis: Jake meets his match in a wily bail jumper who he must bring back to the city -- a task made very difficult when an old nemesis interferes.
episodes.title: The Overpass

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal have to keep up with a mysterious girl who gets one over on them. Jake and Leslie face an unexpected surprise.
episodes.title: Firecracker

episodes.synopsis: Troublemaker Martin Poole comes back, and Jake and Mal have no choice but to contend with a determined hit man when a man's life is on the line.
episodes.title: Gun for Hire

episodes.synopsis: Eccentric novelist Garrison Steele returns and pulls the Doyles into an unusual murder investigation that resembles one of his novels.
episodes.title: The Works

episodes.synopsis: A memory-addled Jake must fill in the blanks from the night before when Sloan goes missing and her worried aunt seeks his help.
episodes.title: Missing

episodes.synopsis: Jake takes a relaxing fishing trip with Mal and Des only to uncover a murder mystery in the woods with two unlikely hunters.
episodes.title: Hook, Line and Sinker

episodes.synopsis: Jake is taken hostage and must investigate from inside a high-stakes robbery at a university while Leslie contends with the situation outside.
episodes.title: Young Guns

episodes.synopsis: When an informant of Leslie's is murdered, she investigates the case with Callum, and their partnership takes an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Major Crimes

episodes.synopsis: Jake crosses paths with a familiar hot-headed cop, Jimmy O'Rourke, while chasing a super hacker. Mal and Rose negotiate their way to a windfall.
episodes.title: Brothers in Arms

episodes.synopsis: Jake pursues a missing painting and a convicted art thief out for revenge. The Doyles are on edge after a brutal attack on one of their own.
episodes.title: Frame Job

episodes.synopsis: Jake must release himself from a debt to a Montreal mob boss by locating a clever hustler. Leslie becomes suspicious of a fellow officer's motives.
episodes.title: Sleight of Hand

episodes.synopsis: Jake is forced to team up with his fugitive former partner, Kevin Crocker, who's determined to clear his name.
episodes.title: Welcome Back Crocker

episodes.synopsis: Jake crosses paths with cop Bill Murdoch on a strange case, but Jake's not sure he's telling the truth.
episodes.title: If the Shoe Fits

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal investigate death threats at the airport targeting a construction magnate. Rose and Des discover something missing from the office safe.
episodes.title: Expansion

episodes.synopsis: Jake faces the consequences of his actions when a loved one's life is at stake. Rose and Des uncover a shocking betrayal from one of their own.
episodes.title: Buried

episodes.synopsis: Jake must figure out how to protect himself in jail while he copes with what happened to Leslie. The Doyles adjust to their new financial situation.
episodes.title: Dirty Deeds

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles find a way to make Jake's bail, but it puts him in a tricky position. Leslie runs into problems when she goes back to work.
episodes.title: No Rest for the Convicted

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Mal take on an insurance fraud case to try to dig themselves out of debt. Leslie avoids Jake and resists going to therapy.
episodes.title: Smash Derby

episodes.synopsis: Jake works with an enigmatic woman to track down a missing driver and head off a crime war. Meanwhile, Mal and Des hit a new low.
episodes.title: The Driver

episodes.synopsis: Jake dodges his parole officer, a former high school nemesis, as he searches for evidence to clear his name. Leslie risks putting her job in jeopardy.
episodes.title: True Lies

episodes.synopsis: Jake finds himself in the middle of a bizarre case when a casket arrives at the bar. Rose and Sloan dig up dirt on Christian's fiance's family.
episodes.title: The Pint

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles team up with Jimmy and Wolf to protect a witness after a strike at the docks ends in violence. A friend from Sloan's past causes trouble.
episodes.title: When the Whistle Blows

episodes.synopsis: The police interrogate the Doyles after a security job goes awry and Jake is suspected of another murder. Jake and Leslie's relationship takes a turn.
episodes.title: Body of Evidence

episodes.synopsis: Jake stands trial for murder, Leslie makes a risky decision, and the Doyles race to solve a high-stakes case in just 48 hours.
episodes.title: Judgement Day

episodes.synopsis: The Doyles get help from an unexpected ally as they scramble to clear Jake's name and secure their freedom.
episodes.title: Last Call
